subject: Re: Clips from this morning Mar 30
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Oh, Kristin.  I'm SO sorry to read of your loss.  That is awful.  I think it is strange how grief 
can whip back on us, sometimes seemingly out of the blue, as if no time has passed.  Once in 
a while, for no apparent reason, I will have one of those days where it just brings me to my 
knees, even after years.  Four months is not a long time at all and it is perfectly 
understandable how your grief could be so raw in this moment.

Sending big 'feel better' hugs your way!!!

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Kristin" <ckmorris95@...> wrote:
>
> As many of you know I lost both my niece and my nephew about 4 months
